snippet.title: Just Dance 2017: Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Just Dance 2017 is out now! 

Dance to one-song free trial of Just Dance 2017, Sorry by Justin Bieber. 
Download the demo and play with your phone by using the Motion Controller App! 
Play for free now  ▶ http://ubi.li/cexmg

Subscribe to our YouTube ▶ http://youtube.com/JustDance
Visit our Website ▶ http://www.JustDanceGame.com 
Join us on Facebook ▶ http://www.facebook.com/JustDanceGame
Follow us on Twitter ▶ http://www.twitter.com/JustDanceGame
Follow us on Instagram ▶ https://instagram.com/justdancegame_us 
Add us on Snapchat ▶ Username: JustDance
#JustDance2017

Introducing Just Dance 2017 – more fun and easier to play than ever. Shake your hips and wave your hands with the Just Dance Controller App – if you have a smartphone, you don’t need a camera or extra peripherals on PS4, XboxOne, and WiiU!

Pull out your phone & get it started with hot tracks and fun favorites – take a sneak peek at the tracklist below:

Sorry – Justin Bieber
Lean On – Major Lazer Ft. MØ & DJ Snake
Cheap Thrills – Sia Ft. Sean Paul
Can’t Feel My Face – The Weeknd 
Into You – Ariana Grande 
Single Ladies (Put a Ring on It) – Beyoncé 
AND MANY MORE! 

Just Dance 2017 is available now on Wii U, Wii, PS4, PS3, Xbox One, Xbox 360, and PC!

© 2016 Ubisoft Entertainment. All Rights Reserved. Just Dance, Ubisoft, and the Ubisoft logo are trademarks of Ubisoft Entertainment in the US and/or other countries.
